trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters" /> is used by Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) add-ins to convert between a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> and an <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 加载项使用 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters" />，在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" /> 之间进行转换。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] extends the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfx-md.md)] add-in model to allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] to be passed between host applications and add-ins. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] requires that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] that are passed either directly or indirectly derive from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] 扩展[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfx-md.md)]外接程序模型允许[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)]主机应用程序和外接程序。 之间传递[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]要求[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uisharpplural-md.md)] ，传递是直接或间接派生自<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.

trans-unit.source: However, add-ins and host applications are typically run in separate application domains and are, consequently, separated by an isolation boundary.
trans-unit.target: 但是，加载项和主机应用程序通常运行在单独的应用程序域中，因此，分隔隔离边界。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] add-in model requires the types that are passed across the isolation boundary to be remotable.
trans-unit.target: 为此，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)]外接程序模型要求跨隔离边界是可远程使用传递的类型。

trans-unit.source: A remotable type conforms to one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 可远程处理类型符合以下项之一：

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> 接口。

trans-unit.source: Has the <xref:System.SerializableAttribute> attribute applied.
trans-unit.target: 具有<xref:System.SerializableAttribute>应用的属性。

trans-unit.source: Derives from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>类。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> is not remotable and must be converted to a remotable type before it is passed across the isolation boundary between an add-in and a host application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> 不是远程和跨隔离边界之间的外接程序和主机应用程序传递之前，必须为可远程处理类型转换。

trans-unit.source: For this purpose, you need to call the static <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ViewToContractAdapter%2A> method to convert the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> to an instance of the remotable <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>.
trans-unit.target: 你需要为此，可以调用静态<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ViewToContractAdapter%2A>方法将转换<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>到的远程实例<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>。

trans-unit.source: Once the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> is passed across the isolation boundary, it must be converted to a type that can be displayed by the host application or the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>传递跨隔离边界中，它必须转换为可由主机应用程序或外接程序显示类型。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the static <xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ContractToViewAdapter%2A> method is called to convert an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract> to a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>.
trans-unit.target: 在此情况下，静态<xref:System.AddIn.Pipeline.FrameworkElementAdapters.ContractToViewAdapter%2A>调用方法来转换<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract>到<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>。

trans-unit.source: For more detailed exposition of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] add-ins, see [WPF Add-Ins Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-add-ins-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关更多详细的展示[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]外接程序，请参阅[WPF 外接程序概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-add-ins-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" /> that was passed across the isolation boundary between the host application and the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 跨主机应用程序和外接程序之间的隔离边界进行传递的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> that has been converted from an <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回已从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> 进行转换的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> that will be displayed from either the host application or add-in, depending on the direction in which the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is passed between the two.
trans-unit.target: 将在主机应用程序或外接程序中显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />，具体取决于 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 在二者之间的传递方向。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" /> to be passed across the isolation boundary between the host application and the add-in.
trans-unit.target: 要跨主机应用程序和外接程序之间的隔离边界进行传递的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" /> that has been converted from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回已从 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" /> 进行转换的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkElement" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" /> that is passed from either the host application or the add-in, depending on the direction in which the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] is passed between the two.
trans-unit.target: 从主机应用程序或外接程序进行传递的 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.INativeHandleContract" />，具体取决于 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 在二者之间的传递方向。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="root" /> is not the root element of a tree of elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="root" /> 不是元素树的根元素。
